author: cbs8
title: CabbyGo - The Breakthrough Taxi, Private Car and Rideshare App - Launches in Chicago
text:
CabbyGo
App connects riders with drivers from a mobile phone in an instant, and drives prices down with features that are unavailable with Uber or taxis
CHICAGO , Sept. 23, CabbyGo, the developer of the world's first "Taxi" app that puts the power in the hands of the people by allowing riders to select their driver based on a variety of qualities, such as price, distance from arrival, type of vehicle and service reputation, announced their launch in Chicago, Illinois .
Costs Less. Performs Better.
CabbyGo is the most innovative and user-friendly ride-finding app in the world. It far outperforms Uber by offering an "auction" platform, where drivers can bid on rides – driving the prices down. Unlike Uber's automatic "peak time" price increases, CabbyGo lets drivers lower their prices to attract riders.
CabbyGo is the best way to request a safe, affordable and reliable ride anywhere in Chicago . Use CabbyGo on a mobile phone to connect to a driver at the touch of a button.
"CabbyGo is going to revolutionize the taxi business in Chicago ," said Joshua Freedman , Founder and CEO of CabbyGo. "With our patented Value-Set Technology, drivers can offer lower prices, plus our service is consistently better than through any other company or app."
Connecting Chicago and Suburbs
CabbyGo provides the ultimate ride service at the lowest possible price, and connects riders with drivers throughout Chicago , the Loop, Gold Coast , River West , Streeterville, Lincoln Park , Bucktown, Wrigleyville, Hyde Park , Bridgeport , Englewood, the South Side, and everywhere in-between.
Whether you're headed to O'Hare, downtown, to a Cubs, Sox, Bears, Bulls or Blackhawks game, or anywhere in the Chicago area, CabbyGo delivers a reliable ride in minutes – and fares are almost always cheaper than a taxi or Uber.
CabbyGo drivers are screened and undergo background checks, have a Commercial Driver's License (CDL), are registered, and properly insured.
CabbyGo is available as a free download on the Apple App Store , and on Google Play . Simply download the app to get started.
For more information, or for drivers and taxi services that want to submit an application to be listed on CabbyGo, please contact the company at: 877-234-8126, or visit: www.cabbygo.com
